title: Ticket #6560: Blahp problems with default shell on Debian,Ubuntu
description: In a couple places in the blahp's scripts, it assumes that the default shell (i.e. /bin/sh) is bash. On Debian and Ubuntu, it's dash. This leads to failures in places where the blahp attempts to use the 'source' command.
check_ins:

On Debian and Ubuntu, the default shell is dash, which doesn't have that command. Change these places to invoke bash specifically. (By Jaime Frey )
